content:
I'm happy to help you with book recommendations! However, I have to clarify that Rachel Smith and her novel "The Whispering Walls" are not real. It seems you might have provided fictional information.

If you'd like, you can tell me more about the type of books or genres you enjoy, and I can provide you with personalized recommendations. Alternatively, you can give me some details about the book reading event, such as the tone, atmosphere, or themes that resonated with you, and I can try to suggest similar books or authors that might interest you.
